about_the_game:
The content will be downloaded to the folder called 'Dead Ground OST'.

Format: MP3 320kbps

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS 2.0 / Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (64-bit)
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

name: Dead Ground - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Card
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard

short_description: Dead Ground Soundtrack is a collection of 14 diverse, dark-electronic tracks.
